comment:
This module contains simple high-level procedures for dealing with the
## web. Use cases: 
##
## * requesting URLs
## * sending and retrieving emails
## * sending and retrieving files from an FTP server
##
## Currently only requesting URLs is implemented. The implementation depends
## on the libcurl library!
##
## **Deprecated since version 0.8.8:** Use the
## `httpclient <httpclient.html>`_ module instead. 
##

name: URLretrieveStream
description: retrieves the given <cite>url</cite> and returns a stream which one can read from to obtain the contents. Returns nil if an error occurs.

name: URLretrieveString
description: retrieves the given <cite>url</cite> and returns the contents. Returns nil if an error occurs.
